page.title: 07Home Life-child's day-cont'd
page.content: We play in the bushes and we found an old carpet to make it really comfortable.One day we found a linnet's nest and quite near to it a chaffinch's nest.As lunchtime approaches we make our way home for lunch.Usually we have a hamburger in a roll and maybe chips.If the weather is sunny and warm we go to the beach after lunch.I'm quite a good swimmer and I like living near the sea.We often take a picnic with us to eat on the beach.Louise likes to look in the rock pools and we often find starfish stranded when the tide is out. There are many interesting things to find on the beach.At about six o'clock we go back home and Louise usually leaves about eight o'clock.I might watch T.V. for a while until I go to bed around nine.I always read a book in bed until Mum comes to switch off the light.
